Event.EventName: You spot your neighbours having a picnic, they wave you over.

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Go over and sit down for a chat.
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: It was nice to see them although you had some stares from people walking around the park.

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Wave from afar and shout some greetings.
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: It would have been nice to talk to them but you're glad you socially distanced.
